Description:
Hotel brisas del mar has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Aguas Dulces. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hotel brisas del mar also feature a city view. At the accommodation, the rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Guests at Hotel brisas del mar can enjoy an American breakfast.

Aguas Dulces Beach is 100 metres from the hotel, while La Sirena is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Capitán de Corbeta Carlos A. Curbelo International Airport, 167 km from Hotel brisas del mar.

Address: Calle De Los Piratas s/n 27200 Aguas Dulces
Description:
Featuring a garden with BBQ facilities, Terrazas de Aguas Dulces offers self-catering apartments with free Wi-Fi in Aguas Dulces. Free parking is provided. Cabo Polonio is 10 minutes away by car.

With private balconies overlooking the sea, apartments at Terrazas de Aguas Dulces are very bright. They have fully-equipped kitchens and air conditioner.

A continental breakfast is served daily.

Terrazas de Aguas Dulces is 45 km from Punta del Diablo and Santa teresa Fortress. The bus station is 50 metres away. Based on local tax laws, Uruguayan citizens may be charged value added tax (VAT 10%) from November 15 to the day after Easter. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Address: Cachimba y Faroles A315 27202 Aguas DulcesRocha
Description:
Strategically located only a few metres from the beach, Apart Hotel Arinos offers self-catering apartments in Aguas Dulces. The property has free WiFi.

Apartments at Apart Hotel Arinos feature air conditioning, a fully-equipped kitchen and a cable TV. All of them have a private bathroom, and some apartments also have a balcony with panoramic views.

At Apart Hotel Arinos you will find a lovely garden and a terrace. The property offers 24-hour front desk service, luggage storage and laundry facilities. Beach chairs are provided. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Located in Aguas Dulces, 1.5 km from Aguas Dulces Beach, Aguas Dulces Resort provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a garden. The resort features a childrens playground, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

At the resort, each room includes a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. Rooms come with a safety deposit box and selected rooms are fitted with pool views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

The nearest airport is Capitán de Corbeta Carlos A. Curbelo International Airport, 166 km from Aguas Dulces Resort. Guests are required to send the property a copy of the ID of the card holder.
HotelFacilities: Parking 24-hour front desk Garden Free parking internet services children's playground Luggage storage wifi Outdoor pool Free WiFi designated smoking area outdoor pool (seasonal) Daily housekeeping parking on site Private parking wifi available in all areas Swimming pool Swimming pool

Description:
Located in Aguas Dulces, within a few steps of Aguas Dulces Beach, Los Lachos offers accommodation with air conditioning.

The holiday home features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy hiking and fishing nearby, or make the most of the garden.
HotelFacilities: paid wifi Garden Parking Windsurfing Hiking Air conditioning Heating Beachfront Free parking Fishing internet services wifi Non-smoking rooms wifi available in all areas

Description:
Palafito, a property with a garden, is situated in Aguas Dulces, 250 metres from Aguas Dulces Beach. This property offers access to a terrace.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom.
HotelFacilities: wifi available in all areas paid wifi Beach Parking Pets allowed Garden Free parking internet services wifi parking on site

HotelName: Hotel Casino San Eugenio del Cuareim
Description:
Boasting on-site casino facilities and air-conditioned rooms with private balconies, the hotel is only 2 blocks from Batlle Square. Wi-Fi is free and there is a gemstone gallery.

Rooms at Hotel Casino San Eugenio del Cuareim are equipped with flat-screen cable TV and minibars, and styled with dark wooden furniture. All of them have private bathrooms with toiletries. The suite features a seating area and a king size bed.

At San Eugenio, guests can enjoy a full buffet breakfast with fruits, cakes, croissants and biscuits. Room service is available.

The hotel is 6 blocks from Artigas Square and 1 km from the international bridge to Brazil. Bicycle rental is available.

There is 24-hour front desk assistance and a handy currency exchange service. Private parking is free. Based on local tax laws, Uruguayan citizens must pay an additional fee of 10%. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Description:
HOTEL DEL NORTE in Artigas features 2-star accommodation with a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. With an outdoor swimming pool, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests.

Every room has a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a city view. At HOTEL DEL NORTE each room has bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The nearest airport is Rubem Berta Airport, 125 km from HOTEL DEL NORTE.

Description:
Located in the heart of Atlántida, this 3-star hotel offers bright rooms with free WiFi access. The property features an indoor swimming pool, a hydromassage tub and a childrens games room.

All bedrooms at Hotel Argentina are equipped with a 22" LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access. They also have air conditioning, hairdryers, safety deposit boxes and minibars.

A large buffet breakfast is available each morning. There are also numerous restaurants overlooking the Sea on La Rambla, just 2 blocks away from Argentina Hotel.

Guests may borrow a book from the hotels library and relax in the communal lounge. A personal computer with Internet access is available for guest use.

Hotel Argentina is 100 metres from downtown Atlántida, where the Casino is set, and a 5-minute walk from the famous statue of El Aguila on the seafront. Carrasco International Airport is 30 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Hotel Argentina in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
CHotel Munday is a 2-star property situated in Atlántida. With a garden, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Guests at Hotel Munday can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Montevideo is 41 km from Hotel Munday, while Piriápolis is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Carrasco International, 24 km from the hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service. Based on local tax laws, Uruguayan citizens must pay an additional fee of 10%. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Address: Rambla Tomas Berreta esquina Calle1 16000 Atlántida
Description:
Boasting a beachfront location, Hotel Rex de Atlántida offers Art-Deco styled rooms with free WiFi access. The property features a terrace with splendid sea views. It is 50 metres from the beach.

Each room at Hotel Rex de Atlántida is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, ceiling fans and private bathroom. They also feature lovely large windows overlooking the garden or beach.

Additional services offered at hotel include free parking, a dining area, a shared lounge and meeting facilities. Guests have access to a heated swimming pool at a local Resort Club, located near the hotel.

The Hotel Rex offers guests a free breakfast each morning. Some of the items available include tea, coffee, milk, sweet cakes and toast. These items may vary seasonally. There is also a dining area where guests can eat their own food.

Zoologico de Atlántida is 750 metres from the hotel. The commercial area is 400 metres away and Carrasco International Airport is 24 km from the property. Based on local tax laws, Uruguayan citizens must pay an additional fee of 10%. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Address: Balneario San Luis, km 62 Ruta Interbalnearia 16300 Atlántida
Description:
Boasting a beachfront location, Hotel Paraty features an outdoor salt-water swimming pool in San Luis. Free WiFi access is available in this hotel. A full breakfast is served daily in the dining area.

Rooms at Hotel Paraty feature air conditioning, cable TVs and private bathrooms. All of them have hardwood floors, a microwave and a minibar.

Other facilities featured at Hotel Paraty include a fitness centre and an onsite restaurant, serving a wide array of local and international dishes.

The property offers free parking. Downtown Atlántida is 18 km away, whereas Punta del Este and Montevideo are 60 km from Hotel Paraty.

Description:
Featuring a large heated swimming pool, a hydromassage tub and spa services. Paradise Complejo Turístico is located in front of Mansa Beach and offers spectacular views of the sunset.  Free WiFi access is available in the entire property. Reiki massages and beaty treatments are available for an extra fee.

At Paradise Complejo Turístico guests can work out at the gym with views of the pool or enjoy a beach day with the hotels complimentary beach umbrellas and chairs.

Paradise offers fully equipped apartments and bungalows with air conditioning and cable TVs. Apartments have private balconies with sea views and bungalows feature outdoor seating areas with lovely views as well.

All of them have modern kitchenettes with microwaves and refrigerators, and bungalows also include private BBQ facilities.

Guests can also enjoy a delicious complimentary breakfast with regional jams in the privacy of their rooms.

This property is only 4 blocks from Atlantida Citys main entertainment venues, shops, restaurants and pubs. The tour desk can provide bicycles (for a fee) and arrange airport shuttles. Private parking is free. Based on local tax laws, Uruguayan citizens may be charged value added tax (VAT 10%) from November 15 to the day after Easter. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, a garden, and a fitness centre, Hotel Centenario is located in Atlántida, 100 metres from the commercial centre and restaurant area. The beach is 200 metres away. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Rooms here will provide you with a private bathroom with shower, air conditioning, a minibar and cable TV.

At Hotel Centenario you will find a 24-hour front desk and a hydromassage tub.

The property is 23 km from Carrasco international airport and 45 km from Montevideo harbour. Based on local tax laws, Uruguayan citizens may be charged value added tax (VAT 10%) from November 15 to the day after Easter. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Address: Avenida Santa Rosa de Lima Balneario Santa Rosa KM 41700Atlantida 16000
Description:
Just 50 metres from the beach, Fortin Santa Rosa offers rooms with free WiFi access. It features elegant Colonial Spanish galleries, marbled chequered floors and a living room fireplace.

Each room at Fortin de Santa Rosa is equipped with a private bathroom including a shower. Some are fitter with a balcony.

Fortin de Santa Rosa has a charming shaded terrace with a central fountain decorated with Spanish mosaics and flowers.

Carrasco Airport is 20 km away and private parking is free. Based on local tax laws, Uruguayan citizens may be charged value added tax (VAT 10%) from November 15 to the day after Easter. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Address: Guayabo y Ciruelo de Japon 16000 Atlántida
Description:
Only 80 metres from Mansa Beach, Apart Hotel Tupungato offers fully furnished accommodation with private balconies in a quiet area. Guests have access to a swimming pool and gym facilities 3 blocks away. Wi-Fi is free.

Apart Hotel Tupungato has comfortable apartments with simple décor. Rooms have cable TV, full kitchen facilities and private bathrooms with showers.

Downtown Atlantida is 4 blocks away from the hotel, with plenty of cafes and dining options. There are on-site BBQ facilities for those wishing to prepare grilled meat, gaucho-style.

Carrasco Airport is 20 km away. Private parking is free. Please note the property is undergoing remodeling work.
Based on local tax laws, Uruguayan citizens must pay an additional fee of 10%. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Description:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Niagara Inn in Atlantida, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of El Fortin de Santa Rosa Beach and Eagle's Nest. This hotel is 2 mi (3.2 km) from Atlantida Zoo and 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Founders of Atlantida Plaza.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 30 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided.

Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and barbecue grills.

Dining
A complimentary breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.
HotelFacilities: Barbecue grill(s) Free WiFi Free breakfast Free self parking Total number of rooms - 30

Address: Calle Republica De Chile s/n 16000 Atlantida
Description:
Hotel Playa Brava is a 3-star property situated in Atlántida. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. The hotel has family rooms.

The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a bath or shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel features some rooms with sea views, and rooms include a private bathroom.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Playa Brava.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Brava, Mansa and Playa Las Toscas. The nearest airport is Carrasco International, 24 km from Hotel Playa Brava, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
HotelFacilities: Restaurant Room service 24-hour front desk Non-smoking rooms Airport shuttle Family rooms Free parking internet services wifi Free WiFi Air conditioning airport shuttle (additional charge)

Address: Camino Americo Briano Ruta 11 km 157 Canelones, s/n15200 Atlántida
Description:
Set in Atlántida, 48 km from Tres Cruces Terminal Station, Estancia Renacimiento offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The hotel has a hot tub, room service and free WiFi.

Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bidet, all guest rooms at the hotel have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a patio. All rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Estancia Renacimiento.

The accommodation offers a childrens playground. Guests at Estancia Renacimiento will be able to enjoy activities in and around Atlántida, like hiking and fishing.

Cagancha Square is 49 km from the hotel, while Independencia Square is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Carrasco International Airport, 31 km from Estancia Renacimiento.

Address: Rambla Mansa Esquina Republica Argentina16000 Atlantida
Description:
Santoral Restaurante y Posada Pet Friendly features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Atlántida. The property is located 42 km from Tres Cruces Terminal Station, 45 km from Cagancha Square and 46 km from Independencia Square. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the inn also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a sea view. At Santoral Restaurante y Posada Pet Friendly every room comes with bed linen and towels.

Continental and American breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation.

The area is popular for fishing and cycling, and bike hire is available at Santoral Restaurante y Posada Pet Friendly.

Popular points of interest near the inn include Mansa, Brava and Villa Argentina Beach. The nearest airport is Carrasco International, 25 km from Santoral Restaurante y Posada Pet Friendly, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
The transport service from / to the airport must be managed through the company that provides it, which is independent of the hotel and has a cost..

Description:
Only 200 meters from the beach, Bungalows Atardecer Apart Hotel offers self-catering bungalows with free Wi-Fi and BBQ facilities in Atlantida. The ruta interbalnearia is 50 meters away and the shopping center is 200 meters from the property.

Bungalows at Atardecer are very bright. They feature air TV, fans and heating. Self-catering facilities include kitchens equipped with a microwave, kitchenware and a refrigerator, dining area and BBQ facilities. Housekeeping service can be requested at a fee.

Bungalows Atardecer Apart Hotel is 700 meters from El Aguila Monument, 800 meters from the casino, 200 meters from the beach and 200 from the Tienda Inglesa supermaket. Carrasco International Airport is 30 km away, Montevideo is 45 km away, whereas Punta del Este is 90 km away. Please inform Bungalows Atardecer Apart Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
HeadLine : On the beach

Location : Located in Carmelo, Carmelo Resort & Spa is on a river, within a 15-minute drive of San Roque Chapel and Estancia de Narbona. This 4-star hotel is 6.1 mi (9.8 km) from Independence Square and 6.3 mi (10.2 km) from Artigas Square.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 44 guestrooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Dining : Grab a bite at Pura, one of the hotel s 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 11 AM.

Private bathrooms have jetted bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Description:
Located in Carmelo, 700 metres from Sere, Bemar Carmelo Hotel provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Featuring a garden, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a shared lounge, room service and currency exchange for guests.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while certain rooms here will provide you with a terrace and others also provide guests with river views. At Bemar Carmelo Hotel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or an American breakfast.

Guests at Bemar Carmelo Hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Carmelo, like cycling.

Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception.

The nearest airport is Jorge Newbery Airfield Airport, 141 km from the hotel.

Description:
Located in a refurbished antique house, AHLO Posada Hostel Boutique offers comfortable room with free WiFi access in downtown Carmelo. The property offers a lovely patio with outdoor barbecue facilities. A full continental breakfast is provided daily.

Each room at AHLO Posada Hostel Boutique features a tasteful décor with detailed decorations. They are fitted with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TVs, bed linens and towels. Guests can opt between shared or private bathrooms with free toiletries.

Guests staying at AHLO Posada Hostel Boutique can prepare their own meals in the well-equipped common kitchen. They can also buy homemade delicacies on site, including wine, olive oil, jams and "dulce de leche", a traditional caramel.

Other facilities are available on site bar and a shared lounge. Several activities can be enjoyed in the surroundings, including hiking and biking. The property organizes regular wine tours, tastings and picnics.

Hostel Boutique AHLO Carmelo is 200 metres from Artigas Square. It is surrounded by an extensive commercial area, including restaurants and shops. Please inform AHLO Posada Hostel Boutique in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please note a baby crib can be accommodated for free.
Please note that front desk is available from 07 to 15.00 after February 1st

Note that front-desk is available from Sunday to Thursday from 07:00 to 23:00. from If arriving outside of these hours, guests are advised to contact the property via the telephone number provided at the reception desk. On Fridays and Saturdays, it is open around-the-clock.

Please note that extra beds cannot be accommodated in Superior Rooms.

The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, heating, and safe. All rooms include a private bathroom with hydromassage shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Superior rooms have a private terrace.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the property.

Guests can have various activities, such as golfing, horse riding and cycling. Bike hire and kayak rental are available at the accommodation.
